text: Whitney Dancin' Special is the first extended play/remix album by American singer Whitney Houston, it was released only in Japan on November 1, 1986 by Arista RecordsIt includes 5 remixed and 1 instrumental versions of songs from Houston's self-titled debut album (1985). The album peaked at #14 in the Japanese charts and sold 19,480 copies there. == Track listing == ==References== Category:1986 albums Category:Remix albums Category:Whitney Houston albums Category:Disco albums Category:Dance albums Category:R&B; albums
title: Whitney Dancin' Special
